title: Grab your skis! Vt. resort is first to open in N. America
text: BING NEWS: Grab your skis! Vt. resort is first to open in N. America A view from the top of Killington Peak on Oct. 18, 2015, at Killington Resort in Vermont. (Photo: Chandler Burgess, Killington Resort) KILLINGTON, Vt. — Skiers in a rush to get back on the mountain are in luck this fall. Killington Resort, which opened ... Grab your skis!
